title: Constant Lag
body: I've had a constant 180 ping on League for the past day or so and wondering if anyone else is running into the same problem and/or knows a method of fixing it. The lag is strictly limited to League as my ping on teamspeak and several speed tests say its 40, my upload and download speed is fine as well, Youtube videos load smoothly and so do streams so i do not see any reason for this lag, 180 constant makes it unplayable.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you do the following for me;

* [Download WinMTR](https://sourceforge.net/projects/winmtr/files/WinMTR-v092.zip/download) and run a traceroute to the following IP. (Allow this to run for 5-15 minutes)
  * 103.240.227.5
* Once adequate time has passed, stop the traceroute, export your results as text.
* Run the [ICSI netalyzr](http://netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/).
* Post back with a link to your WinMTR results (You can use [pastebin](http://pastebin.com/) for this) and the url to your ICSI netalyzr results.

I've been running into the same Issue, started a day or so ago for me as well. My ping used to sit at 27, now its consistently sitting at 160 ping making it difficult to play the game, Have checked other games such as overwatch and no issues there so not sure what is going on at all.
Unfortunately I don't have a fix for this issue, but if you find one, please let me know as well.
Whats your internet provider? if we have the same one that might be an issue. im gona send a ticket now and see if they resolve anything hit me up on league ill tell you if anythings changed
